president_text: On behalf of all the members of the Najm Association, I welcome you to our digital platform. It reflects our commitment to youth, our vision for community development, and our desire to act for economic and professional inclusion.
president_full_text: Mr. Hassan Rizk, President of the Najm Association, welcomes you to the association's platform, which reflects his commitment to the economic and professional integration of youth. The association firmly believes that young people are the drivers of change and that supporting them is essential for sustainable development. It is based on values such as respect, transparency, equality, and trust, while establishing local and international partnerships. Its goal is to become a reference platform to guide, train and inspire young people, so that they become actors of development and future leaders.
presentation_text: Najm Association is a non-profit organization that aims to support young people, children, and families through educational, cultural, and social initiatives. It is actively committed to promoting solidarity, equal opportunity, and local development. Najm Association is a non-profit organization that aims to support young people, children, and families through educational, cultural, and social initiatives. It is actively committed to promoting solidarity, equal opportunity, and local development.

partnership_section.title: Signing of a Strategic Partnership
partnership_section.subtitle: Between the Irchad platform and the Faculty of Arts and Sciences, to foster local development and innovation.
partnership_section.intro_text: As part of a strategic initiative, a partnership agreement was signed on Thursday, January 13, 2022, in the presence of the Governor of Moulay Rachid Prefecture. This partnership aims to strengthen synergies between academic, economic, and social institutions to support innovation and sustainable development in the industrial zone of Ben M’sik Sidi Othmane.
objectives: Foster innovation and the development of local economic projects, particularly in technological and creative fields.
Establish an integrated ecosystem linking university, economy, and civil society for lasting impact.
Promote environmental and social sustainability in all supported projects.
Connect science and society through scientific and cultural initiatives engaging students and citizens.
partnership_section.perspectives_text: This partnership promises to transform the industrial zone into a hub of innovation and attractiveness, boosting employment, investment, and highlighting the importance of interinstitutional collaboration for sustainable development.

coop_event_1_title: Study Day on Cooperatives: Strengthening the Social and Solidarity Economy
coop_event_1_p1: On the occasion of the International Day of Cooperatives, the Prefecture of Moulay Rachid districts organized, in partnership with the Najm Association for the Economic Inclusion of Youth, a study meeting on Tuesday, July 16, 2024, under the theme: 'Cooperatives Serving a Sustainable Social and Solidarity Economy'.
coop_event_1_p2: This event was held at the Irchad platform, dedicated to supporting and developing youth capacities.
coop_event_1_p3: It brought together many officials from the public and private sectors, including the Governor of Moulay Rachid districts and his team, the vice-presidents of Sidi Othmane and Moulay Rachid districts, department heads, representatives of the Ministry of Cooperation, taxes, the Chamber of Crafts, and the National Cooperation delegate.
coop_event_2_p1: The meeting highlighted the crucial role of cooperatives in achieving sustainable development and strengthening the social and solidarity economy, especially in the face of economic and social challenges faced by vulnerable populations and youth.
coop_event_2_p2: It was also an opportunity for dialogue among stakeholders, including cooperatives supported by the National Initiative for Human Development and the Youth Economic Inclusion Program within the social and solidarity economy framework.
coop_event_3_ul1: Sharing Experiences: Presenting successful cooperative models, identifying challenges and potential solutions.
coop_event_3_ul2: Strengthening Networks: Promoting sustainable partnerships between cooperatives and support institutions.
coop_event_3_ul3: Encouraging Innovation: Stimulating innovation to offer high value-added products and services.
coop_event_3_end: The event concluded with a call to continue these collaborative initiatives and strengthen joint efforts so that cooperatives become key pillars of local development.

partnership_irchad.main_title: Signing of a Partnership between the Irchad Platform and the Faculty of Letters and Sciences
partnership_irchad.paragraph1: As part of a strategic approach to establishing a sustainable cooperation system, a partnership agreement was signed on Thursday, January 13, 2022, during a ceremony presided over by the Governor of the Moulay Rachid districts. This partnership aims to strengthen collaboration between academic, economic, and social institutions to promote sustainable development and innovation in the Ben M’Sick Sidi Othmane industrial zone.
partnership_irchad.axis1_text: This partnership aims to create an environment conducive to innovation and the development of local economic projects, particularly in technology and creative industries.
partnership_irchad.axis2_text: Developing interaction mechanisms between academic, economic, and civil society institutions to ensure synergy beneficial to all stakeholders.
partnership_irchad.axis3_text: Supporting environmentally and socially responsible projects while actively involving the local community in their implementation.
partnership_irchad.axis4_text: Organizing cultural and scientific initiatives to raise awareness among students and citizens about the importance of integrating knowledge with action.
partnership_irchad.conclusion_text: This partnership is expected to boost the development of the Ben M’Sick Sidi Othmane industrial zone, stimulate employment and investment, and serve as a model of successful collaboration between institutions for sustainable and innovative development.

objectifs.p1: Najm Association aims to make the Irchad platform a leading reference in the economic inclusion of youth, while aligning with the spirit of the National Initiative for Human Development.
objectifs.p2: The association seeks to make this platform a convergence space for various youth-targeted programs, making it a model for providing information and guidance, thus meeting the aspirations of youth and supporting their ambitions.
objectifs.p3: It focuses on creating a work environment conducive to youth economic inclusion by forming agreements and partnerships with national and international institutions from academic, economic, and civil society sectors.
objectifs.p4: The association adopts good governance based on competence, by implementing transparent and flexible decision-making mechanisms, including the development of a comprehensive procedures manual for administrative and financial operations, with the aim of obtaining public utility status and strengthening trust in its actions.

valeurs.titre: Values and Principles of the Association

respect.texte: The association places great importance on building strong human relationships based on mutual respect. It recognizes the value of each individual, especially youth, as essential partners in development.

transparence.texte: Transparency ensures the clarity and credibility of our actions. The association maintains open communication with youth and partners to strengthen trust and understanding.

confiance.texte: Trust is essential for sustainable cooperation. The association supports young people with kindness to help them achieve their goals with confidence.

egalite.texte: Equal opportunity for all individuals is a fundamental principle in the association’s work. It is committed to providing an inclusive environment where young people, regardless of their social or cultural background, can access opportunities that help them fulfill their potential and contribute to sustainable development.

dignite.texte: The association places the preservation of human dignity at the heart of its action by respecting the rights of youth and valuing their participation in society in a way that respects their worth and potential. It strives to create a supportive environment that enables young people to actively participate in socio-economic development while preserving their dignity.

engagement.texte: Commitment to responsibility is the cornerstone of the association’s success in achieving its objectives. The association works efficiently and with integrity to design and implement initiatives aimed at the economic and social empowerment of youth, while ensuring rigorous follow-up to achieve expected results.

citoyennete.texte: The association considers youth as a driving force of economic and social development. It strives to strengthen their sense of belonging by involving them in projects serving the nation, thus anchoring the values of active citizenship and promoting sustainable renewal.

formation.texte: The association considers youth as a driving force of economic and social development. It strives to strengthen their sense of belonging by involving them in projects serving the nation, thus anchoring the values of active citizenship and promoting sustainable renewal.

vision.intro: The Najm Association for the Economic Inclusion of Youth aims to:
objectifs: Empower youth: by developing their skills to facilitate their integration into the labor market.
Value talents: identify the hidden potential of youth and help it emerge.
Improve employability: provide effective training to increase employment opportunities.
Support entrepreneurship: accompany young project holders with technical and financial support.
Encourage the social economy: promote sustainable local cooperative initiatives.
Develop partnerships: create networks with the public, private, and non-profit sectors.
Strengthen citizenship: spread the values of volunteerism and community engagement.
Contribute to sustainable development: stimulate youth creativity for responsible projects.

questions.q: How can I join the association?
questions.r: You can contact us via the contact form or come directly to our headquarters in Moulay Rachid – Sidi Othmane.

questions.q: Do you support young project holders?
questions.r: Yes, our Irchad platforms offer personalized support to structure, fund, and launch youth projects.
All our offered training sessions are free thanks to the support of our institutional partners.

questions.q: Can I get funding for my project?
questions.r: Yes, some projects may receive financial support after evaluation, especially within the framework of the National Initiative for Human Development.

questions.q: What types of projects do you support?
questions.r: We mainly support projects with high social or economic impact: cooperatives, self-entrepreneurship, community initiatives.

questions.q: Who can benefit from your services?
questions.r: Any young person aged 18 to 35, living in the Moulay Rachid – Sidi Othmane area, with an idea or project to develop.

questions.q: How does the support process work?
questions.r: After an initial meeting, we establish a support plan that includes training, coaching sessions, and personalized follow-up.

video.title: Discover our action in video
video.unsupported: Your browser does not support HTML5 video playback.

sections.title: Areas of Intervention
sections.content:
The Irchad Youth Platform was created to support and accompany emerging cooperatives, free initiatives and self-employment at the level of the Moulay Rachid district prefecture, within the framework of the third phase of the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH).
This platform aims to provide material and intellectual support to young people wishing to launch economic projects or social initiatives, particularly in the fields of self-employment and cooperative creation.
It constitutes a space for social innovation, focusing on training and workshops designed to strengthen young people's skills in various fields such as management, marketing and project management. It also seeks to promote employment, encourage business creation and develop cooperatives, while facilitating access to information on economic opportunities and available funding sources.
Through this platform, the initiative aims to stimulate entrepreneurial spirit and cooperation among young people, while strengthening innovation and sustainable development in the region. It thus contributes to increasing economic and social development in the Moulay Rachid prefecture.

sections.title: Mission of the "Youth Platform"
sections.content:
The platform's mission is based on listening, guidance and counseling. It aims to provide psychological and social support to young people through several components:
Listening: The platform allows young people to express themselves freely about their ideas and feelings, thus strengthening their ability to face life's challenges.
Guidance: It offers specialized advice in various fields such as education, employment, relationships, mental health, and other important topics for youth.
Counseling: The platform guides young people in their decision-making, both personally and professionally, helping them build a better future.
Through this mission, the platform works to strengthen young people's capacities and empower them, so that they become active and influential actors within society.

sections.title: Management of Irchad platforms in Moulay Rachid – Sidi Othmane
sections.content:
The Najm Association for Youth Economic Inclusion manages two Irchad platforms located in the Moulay Rachid – Sidi Othmane prefecture. Through this initiative, the association supports project idea holders by welcoming them, listening to their ideas and projects, then offering them support adapted to each case.

The platforms offer a stimulating environment for young entrepreneurs, with professional, technical and financial support, thus facilitating their economic integration and the development of their ideas into concrete and successful projects.

sections.title: Social and Solidarity Economy: Support Measures for Cooperatives
sections.content:
Within the framework of economic development and the promotion of social innovation, specific support measures for cooperatives are implemented, covering several axes:
Cooperative Support
Integrated and progressive support is offered to cooperatives and project holders, from the creation phase to post-launch. This support aims to ensure their sustainability and development, with particular emphasis on projects resulting from value chain analysis.
Technical Support and Creation Assistance
This includes support in creation procedures, preparation of business plans, and structuring of cooperatives. Support also extends to identifying relevant economic activities through value chain analysis.
Brand Identity Creation
Support helps develop brands that reflect the identity of cooperatives and local projects, strengthening their credibility and market positioning, locally and internationally.
Quality Certifications
Support also includes obtaining certifications that guarantee the quality of products or services, thus improving the reputation of cooperatives and consumer confidence.
Post-Creation Support
In addition to the launch phase, continuous follow-up is ensured: additional advice, targeted training, support for financial and administrative management, facilitating the transition to the growth stage.
The objective of these actions is to guarantee sustainable growth, competitiveness of cooperatives, and job creation for young people and the local population, while promoting innovation.

sections.title: Components of a Project Incubator
sections.content:
A project incubator is a structure dedicated to supporting individuals or teams wishing to launch a project, especially in the early stages. Its objective is to offer a favorable environment for transforming ideas into viable and scalable projects.
Technical Support and Guidance
The incubator provides advice on strategy, marketing, finance and management, so that projects are built on solid foundations and able to adapt to the market.
Financial Support
Some incubators offer initial funding or facilitate access to funding sources (grants, loans, venture capital), to cover launch costs.
Training and Workshops
Specialized workshops and training are offered in areas such as digital marketing, investor presentations, team management, or financial planning.
Logistical Support
Incubators provide coworking spaces with everything necessary (internet, offices, meeting rooms), promoting a motivating work environment.
Networking and Mentoring
They offer opportunities to connect with investors, sector experts, other entrepreneurs, or academic institutions.
Market Access
Incubators support product commercialization, by facilitating participation in fairs, exhibitions and economic events.
Continuous Monitoring
They provide medium and long-term support, through project performance analysis, strategic adjustments and targeted support.

sections.title: Objectives of a Project Incubator
sections.content:
+ Stimulate innovation through support for innovative projects
+ Reduce failure risks by offering support from the early stages
+ Promote job creation
+ Strengthen the local economy through entrepreneurship promotion

sections.title: Youth Capacity Development
sections.content:
Strengthening Personal and Professional Skills
The platform aims to strengthen key skills such as:
- Effective communication
- Time management
- Problem solving
- Use of digital tools
- Leadership
- Financial management

Entrepreneurship Support:
Young people are supported in transforming their ideas into businesses, with training in:
- Business plan development
- Digital marketing
- Project management
- Technical assistance for SMEs

Access to Employment:
The platform facilitates professional integration through:
- Certified training
- Internships and field experiences
- Job fairs and coaching sessions

Stimulating Innovation and Creativity:
Presentation and prototyping spaces are offered to encourage young people to create innovative solutions to social and economic challenges.

Strengthening Social Awareness:
Through volunteer programs, young people are encouraged to get involved in community projects related to education, health or the environment.

Activities and programs offered by the youth platform:

- Professional training: in programming, design, digital marketing...
- Life skills workshops: critical thinking, negotiation, personal organization
- Counseling and support: to set career goals, launch a project
- Entrepreneurship preparation: business plan, market study, management
- Job fairs and opportunities: company meetings, CV/interview coaching
- Community events: social and environmental actions

Platform benefits:
- Youth empowerment: personal development and financial independence
- Positive local impact: job creation, increased local productivity
- Adaptation to the digital age: acquisition of digital skills
- Strengthening entrepreneurial culture: promoting innovation

sections.title: Intervention Axes
sections.content:
The Irchad Youth Platform supports cooperatives, self-employment and youth initiatives in Moulay Rachid district as part of the INDH.
It offers material and intellectual support, particularly in cooperative creation.
It promotes innovation through training and workshops in project management and marketing.

- Guidance: Helping youth make life and career decisions

listing.title: Projects in the Sidi Othmane Area

gallery.title: Inauguration of Professional Trainings
gallery.section1_p1: The Najm Association officially launched three vocational training programs for youth: web development, graphic design, and digital marketing. This initiative aims to provide a real opportunity for professional integration through in-demand skills.
gallery.section1_p2: These programs are designed to meet the demands of the current digital world, with a focus on practical application, creativity, and innovation.
gallery.section2_p1: These training programs are led by experienced professionals who adopt a project-based pedagogical approach. Each participant benefits from individualized support, practical workshops, and real-world individual or group projects.
gallery.section2_p2: The goal is to enable each young person to develop their technical skills and creativity, as well as strengthen their self-confidence in a dynamic and stimulating environment.
gallery.program_web: Web Development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, responsive website creation.
gallery.program_design: Graphic Design: Figma, Photoshop, visual identity, visual communication.
gallery.program_marketing: Digital Marketing: social media, content creation, SEO, advertising campaigns.
gallery.training_p1: Classes take place in a dynamic and participatory environment, with each week featuring practical workshops, feedback sessions, inspiring lectures, and group challenges.
gallery.training_p2: Emphasis is placed on youth participation, collaborative work, and the realization of digital projects that respond to real issues.
gallery.success_p: Thanks to the commitment of trainers, partners, and young people, this first session laid the foundations for a true dynamic of learning and transformation. This program is seen as a launchpad for a bright digital future for our youth.
gallery.image_share_exchange: Sharing and exchange at the heart of our sessions

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Saliha Baha, 36 years old, founder of Baha Happy Park, a project dedicated to entertaining children through games, animations, and fun party organization.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: Create a safe and fun recreational space for children. Offer educational and playful activities to stimulate their imagination and develop their skills. Strengthen family bonds through activities that bring together parents and children. Create a joyful and enriching experience within a structured and professional environment.

sections.title: Support and assistance
sections.content: INDH (National Initiative for Human Development): financial support of 100,000 MAD, enabling the project's launch. Youth Platform – Irchad: 3-month training, technical, economic, legal, and field support. Association Najm: moral support and continuous assistance during planning and execution.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Equipped play area for children. Fun and educational games and competitions. Personalized children's parties. Interactive and evolving programs to encourage creativity. Job creation for qualified profiles. Professional team in uniform to ensure discipline and a cheerful atmosphere.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: INDH: financial support of 100,000 MAD. Youth Platform – Irchad: training and full support. Association Najm: moral and operational support throughout the project stages.

vision_guidelines.title: The guidelines that lead our vision
vision_guidelines.paragraph: The launch of the third phase of the National Initiative for Human Development, through the strengthening of its achievements and the refocusing of its programs on the development of human capital, the improvement of the conditions of rising generations, the support of vulnerable groups, and the launch of a new generation of income-generating and job-creating initiatives (...).
vision_guidelines.citation: Excerpt from the Throne Speech delivered by His Majesty King Mohammed VI, may God assist him, on Sunday, July 29, 2018.

permanent_team.title: Najm Association: A Permanent Team
permanent_team.paragraph1: As part of its strategy for development and autonomy, Najm Association relies on a permanent team composed of administrators, guidance and counseling advisors, trainers, and soft skills coaches. This team plays a key role in the implementation of the programs overseen by the association and in supporting the beneficiaries at every stage of their journey.
permanent_team.paragraph2: To ensure high-quality support and continuous adaptation to economic and technological developments, Najm Association invests in strengthening the skills and capacities of its permanent team. Regular training sessions are organized to enhance the competencies of its staff, particularly in the area of trainer training, as well as in digital innovation and entrepreneurship support.
permanent_team.paragraph3: Through this ongoing dynamic of development and service improvement, Najm Association reinforces its role as a key player in the advancement of economic and social inclusion by ensuring effective, innovative, and high-quality supervision for its beneficiaries.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Hanan Aghriwi, founder of Planet Food project, is a 28-year-old young woman with a degree in culinary arts. She has over 5 years of experience in this field. She started her professional career at home, preparing meals for events and parties, with a constant concern to offer impeccable quality at affordable prices. This allowed her to build a good reputation with her clients. She chose the fast food sector due to her passion for cooking and the observation of a growing demand for quality food at reasonable prices. For her, quality and accessibility are the two pillars that guarantee the success of a project in this field. Through Planet Food, Hanan wants to offer a fast food experience that is tasty, accessible at any time and place, while respecting strict hygiene and quality standards.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: Planet Food is an innovative project in the fast food industry. It aims to offer light and quick meals to prepare, combining excellent quality and affordable prices. The project seeks to meet the nutritional needs of all social categories, favoring healthy and safe products, thanks to rigorous hygiene, adequate preparation, and compliant storage that preserves the quality and safety of the ingredients used. The project is located in the Moulay Rachid – Sidi Othmane prefecture, precisely on Ahmed Rgoub street, with the objective of providing fast and high-quality service to consumers in this area. Furthermore, the project aims to create four local jobs, thus participating in the economic stability of employees and supporting the local economy. Planet Food is not just about selling food: it's a desire to offer a fast, pleasant culinary experience that respects the highest standards.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: The National Initiative for Human Development (INDH) of the Moulay Rachid prefecture is the main support for the Planet Food project. It played a key role by providing financial support to gather the necessary resources for creating and launching the project. In parallel, the Youth Platform also played an essential role. It allowed Hanan to have access to support opportunities, offering prior training and continuous accompaniment throughout the planning and execution phases. Thanks to the support of qualified professionals via this platform, Hanan and other young people benefited from specialized training in various fields, strengthening their skills and preparation for entrepreneurship. This comprehensive accompaniment was decisive for obtaining INDH funding and greatly contributed to propelling the Planet Food project towards success.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Planet Food specializes in fast food and offers a variety of light meals, including pizzas, tacos, coussamia, sandwiches and juices. The objective is to satisfy all tastes and meet the needs of all age groups. Quality is the main added value of the project. Hanan ensures to use fresh ingredients and healthy bases to guarantee tasty and safe meals with each order. In addition to dishes, the project also offers refreshing and healthy natural juices, such as lemon, carrot, beetroot and lime juice, all prepared daily with 100% natural ingredients, enriching the customer experience. Thanks to this offer, Planet Food aims to provide meals that are both fast and nutritious, while respecting the highest quality standards, making it a preferred choice for consumers looking for a unique culinary experience.

sections.title: Information about the founder

Since 2020, he has worked with several companies in Morocco and internationally, which allowed him to acquire solid expertise in the digital field and content creation.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: Alphacom is an innovative digital agency that offers comprehensive services in digital marketing, video production, professional photography and web development. The objective is to respond to the challenges faced by companies and entrepreneurs, particularly in terms of digital visibility, quality content and effective marketing strategy.

sections.title: Objectives
sections.content: Offer professional and personalized services. Strengthen the digital presence of companies. Create a positive and lasting impact in the digital ecosystem.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Digital marketing: strategy creation, sponsored campaign management. Video production: advertising videos, professional editing. Photography: commercial and product photo sessions. Web development: creation of modern, responsive and SEO-optimized sites.

sections.title: Partners

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Adam El Fadil, 24 years old, founder of Pixel Prod, a company specialized in audiovisual and digital design. With over 5 years of experience in graphic design, motion design and video production, he developed his skills working as a freelancer with several agencies and companies.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: Propose complete creative solutions for start-ups and project holders. Offer quality audiovisual services, accessible at competitive prices. Stimulate the local economy and encourage youth employment in the creative field.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: INDH (National Initiative for Human Development): financial and logistical support. Youth Platform – Irchad: prior training, administrative, economic and legal accompaniment. Najm Association: continuous accompaniment and strategic advice.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Video production: advertisements, promotional films, short films. Graphic design: logos, visual identities, advertising visuals. 2D/3D motion design: animations and 3D modeling. Professional photography: product and commercial photos. Project management platform: interactive interface to follow production stages.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Wael Fikri, 22 years old, self-entrepreneur specialized in audiovisual production with over 3 years of experience in the field. Thanks to his passion and expertise, he joined the Youth Platform – Irchad program to benefit from both financial and training support.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: Offer complete audiovisual production services (cinema, television, events). Create jobs for young professionals in the audiovisual sector. Stimulate local skills in the media and image field. Ensure sustainable production, relying on long-term contracts with loyal clients.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: The project benefited from support from INDH, the Irchad Youth Platform, and the Najm Association for economic inclusion.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Professional filming for any type of project. Editing, post-production and video realization. Modern technical equipment adapted to market needs. Customized solutions for companies and individuals wanting high-quality audiovisual content.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Zakaria Anbari, 33 years old, founder of a company specialized in event organization with sound and lighting. He has 8 years of experience in this field in Morocco, where he acquired solid skills in professional services related to sound and light for various types of events.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: AZ Event 733 is based in Sidi Othmane and specialized in technical support for events in sound and lighting. The company focuses on festivals and large gatherings, ensuring clear lighting and well-calibrated sound, through professional organization guaranteeing the success of each event.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: The project benefited from financial support of 100,000 dirhams from the National Initiative for Human Development. Support and complete training through the Youth Platform under supervision of Najm Association.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Specialized services in event organization and large events. Integrated solutions in sound and lighting. Modern lighting equipment and advanced audio systems to guarantee clear and homogeneous sound quality.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: National Initiative for Human Development, Najm Association.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Pretty Events is an agency specialized in party decoration, offering services according to the highest standards of quality and creativity. The agency stands out by creating unique decorations, adapted to each type of event.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: At Pretty Events, we offer a wide range of decoration services for events: birthdays, graduation parties, baby showers, engagements, weddings, and business openings. The added value of the project lies in the design of innovative decorations, thought out to the smallest detail.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Funding of 96,000 dirhams from the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH). Moral support and continuous guidance through the Irchad platform, with complete 3-month training.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Decoration services for various events with innovative decoration design. Use of the latest technologies in design to offer an exceptional experience. Flexible prices adapted to all budgets.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: National Initiative for Human Development (INDH), Irchad Platform, Najm Association.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Zakaria Anbari, 33 years old, founder of a company specialized in event organization with sound and lighting. He has 8 years of experience in this field in Morocco.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: ERREGYBY EVENT is specialized in technical support for events in sound and lighting. The company focuses on festivals and large gatherings, ensuring clear lighting and well-calibrated sound.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Financial support of 100,000 dirhams from the National Initiative for Human Development. Three-month training with continuous field monitoring alongside Irchad platform supervisors.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Specialized services in event organization and large events. Integrated solutions in sound and lighting for festivals, conferences, concerts and other events.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: National Initiative for Human Development, Najm Association.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Ibtessem Khalil, 36 years old, founder of the Seafood Snack project. With training in the restaurant field and over 10 years of experience in this sector.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: Snack specialized in seafood, aiming to provide healthy and varied food options, accessible to all age groups. The project aims to create employment opportunities for local youth.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Support from the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH) of Moulay Rachid prefecture. Support from the Irchad Youth Platform with training and financial support.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Fried seafood, salads, soups and varied sandwiches. Commitment to providing fresh, varied and high-quality dishes, with particular attention paid to the healthy and nutritious aspect.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: National Initiative for Human Development, Najm Association.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Zineb Badi, passionate entrepreneur, chose the field of traditional catering. Having grown up in a family environment that valued cooking, she inherited her passion from her mother.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: Snack Yaqout offers traditional Moroccan dishes: chicken with onions, rfissa, couscous, Moroccan tagine, fish balls, teklia, calf's head with chickpeas, white beans, lentils, and various fried dishes.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Funding of 100,000 dirhams from the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH). Support from the Youth Platform – Irchad with 3-month training and financial support.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Rich and authentic menu of Moroccan culinary heritage. Featured dishes including chicken with onions, rfissa, tagine, vegetable couscous, teklia, sardine balls, loubia and lentils. Prices between 10 and 30 dirhams.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: INDH, Irchad Platform, Najm Association, local suppliers, neighborhood customers.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Fatima Zahra Chajari, 32 years old, founder of Dar Miya company, specialized in catering. She has 4 years of professional experience, supplemented by 3 years of home practice.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: Dar Miya is an establishment specialized in Brunch Coffee, aiming to promote a balanced diet with particular emphasis on the importance of breakfast. The project offers tasty and nutritious options.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Significant support from the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH), covering 90% of financing needs. Intensive support via the Irchad Youth Platform with 3-month training.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Catering service based on a flexible and personalized offer. Menu including the option 'Compose your breakfast to your taste'. 'Dish of the day' program with varied Moroccan and oriental dishes.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: INDH (90% funding), Irchad Youth Platform, Najm Association, founder's family.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Othman Chafi, 30 years old, founder of Foratino company, specialized in fast food. He has about 8 years of experience in this field, including 4 years spent in 5-star hotels.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: The Foratino project was born from great enthusiasm for fast food and growing market demand. The project aims to offer innovative dishes at affordable prices while maintaining an excellent level of service.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Support from the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH) with financial aid of 99,000 dirhams. Training and market study by the Youth Platform – Irchad. Moral support by Najm Association.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Variety of original dishes in fast food: chicken roulade, baked potatoes, minced meat balls. Special promotions on large orders and family entertainment.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: INDH (99,000 MAD), Youth Platform – Irchad, Najm Association.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Najate El Haffa, 40 years old, founder of LA TABLE D'MOTIONS SARLAU company. She has 8 years of experience in event catering. What started as a passion became a professional activity.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: The project consists of offering a catering service for special occasions: weddings, private parties, conferences or corporate events. LA TABLE D'MOTIONS facilitates clients' lives by taking charge of complete meal preparation.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Financial support of 90,000 dirhams from the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH). Support by the Youth Platform and Najm Association. 3-month training to acquire necessary skills.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Personalized catering service for weddings, parties and various events. Carefully prepared traditional Moroccan meals, ready to serve. Use of fresh and local ingredients to enhance authenticity.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: INDH (90,000 MAD), Youth Platform, Najm Association.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Loubna Laakari, 39 years old, founder of Om Ali Food company. She has 3 years of experience in developing her project, which she designed with the will to contribute to the economic and social development of the neighborhood.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: The Om Ali Food project aims to strengthen the economic and social environment of the neighborhood by creating jobs, training young people in cooking and management professions, and using fresh products from local agriculture.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Support from the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH) and the Irchad Youth Platform. Prior training allowing to acquire solid skills in project management and understanding of the local market.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Varied range of light meals, combining traditional Moroccan specialties (baghrir, maqroud) and international options (various sandwiches, quick snacks). Healthy alternatives like natural juices, low-fat sandwiches, organic salads.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: National Initiative for Human Development (INDH), Irchad Youth Platform.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Chaimaa Majdoub, 29 years old, founder of Kitchen Chaimaa project. With 10 years of experience in cooking, she decided to launch this project in response to strong demand in the Moroccan market.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: Kitchen Chaimaa is a Moroccan snack offering light, balanced and healthy meals, adapted to different moments and needs of the day. The project focuses on quality, use of natural ingredients and product accessibility.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Support from the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH) in Moulay Rachid prefecture with valuable funding. Support by the Irchad Youth Platform with entrepreneurship training.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Wide range of healthy and tasty products: varied sandwiches, organic salads, hot and cold drinks, soups, light snacks and quick breakfasts. Regular promotions and loyalty programs.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: INDH, Irchad Youth Platform, Najm Association for economic inclusion of youth.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Wafae El Hana, 35 years old, founder of Delicesl Hanae company, specialized in event organization and cooking. With 10 years of experience in this field, she launched this project to make use of her skills.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: The choice to launch Delicesl Hanae stems from a decade of experience in event organization and gastronomy. Wafae wanted to modernize the sector by introducing innovative and personalized services for events such as weddings, birthdays, conferences.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Funding of 100,000 dirhams from the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH). Support by the Irchad platform and Najm Association. 3-month training provided by Irchad.

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Superior quality event catering services. Complete event organization (decoration, coordination). Live cooking demonstrations. Private chef service. Consulting for companies and individuals.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: INDH (100,000 DH), Irchad platform, Najm Association.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Reda Qadda, 34 years old, studied applied arts, then specialized in audiovisual by obtaining diplomas in digital editing and digital content creation.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: GO EVENT DIGILAB is a company specialized in audiovisual content production, advertising creation and event organization. The project aims to create more than 20 direct and indirect jobs in the medium term.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Complete support from the pre-launch phase. In-depth entrepreneurship training via the Irchad platform and Najm Association. Funding of 100,000 dirhams from the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH).

sections.title: Products and services
sections.content: Audiovisual content production (institutional videos, social capsules, documentaries). Advertising creation (posters, spots, branding). Event organization (corporate, cultural, social).

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: INDH, Irchad platform, Najm Association.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Khadija Siri, young 22-year-old entrepreneur passionate about event organization. Her journey began with a one-year experience with a party organizer, which allowed her to acquire valuable expertise.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: Driven by my passion, I launched my own project: a micro-enterprise dedicated to organizing family and festive events. Located on An-Nil Street, a dynamic and well-served neighborhood, my project aims to offer quality, personalized and accessible service.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Valuable support from the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH). Support by the Irchad platform and Najm Association through a complete training program: market study, understanding client needs, developing concrete action plans.

sections.title: Proposed services
sections.content: Personal event coordination: birthdays, engagements, graduation ceremonies. Decoration: personalized atmosphere (romantic, classic, modern), floral decoration and carefully arranged furniture. Table services: buffets, drinks, personalized cakes.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: INDH, Irchad platform, Najm Association for economic inclusion of youth.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Mustapha Flahi, founder of 'MaMoN Food's' brand, is an entrepreneur passionate about fast food combining tradition and innovation. His project is rooted in culinary know-how inherited from several generations.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: Located in Essadri (Moulay Rachid district), 'MaMoN Food's' is an innovative fast food project that mixes local recipes (shawarma, sandwiches) with international inspirations (burritos, pizzas, tacos).

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Support from the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH) with technical and psychological support provided by qualified trainers via Najm Association. Rigorous training combined with valuable financial aid.

sections.title: Proposed products and services
sections.content: Varied range of fast food: all types of sandwiches, burgers, international pizzas, tacos, burritos, as well as the signature dish 'Monte Cristo'. 'Happy Hour' formula: weekly time slot where all dishes are offered at reduced rates.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: National Initiative for Human Development (INDH), Najm Association, Irchad platform.

sections.title: Information about the founder
sections.content: Tarek Keghat, 30 years old, founder of the agency specialized in digital marketing, has 12 years of experience in e-commerce and 3 years in website creation and digital advertising campaigns.

sections.title: Project presentation
sections.content: Social Media Marketing Agency Keghat is an agency specialized in digital marketing. It offers innovative solutions to promote products and services online, aiming to improve visibility and sales of artisans, SMEs and service providers.

sections.title: Support and accompaniment
sections.content: Financial support of 100,000 dirhams from the National Initiative for Human Development (INDH). 3-month training in project management by the 'Irchad' platform. This support allowed to legally structure the project.

sections.title: Proposed products and services
sections.content: Startup Package at 3999 DHS for young companies: professional Landing Page creation, social media page configuration, short training in social media management, Google Maps account creation, design of 5 advertising visuals, one-month advertising campaign, visual goodies.

sections.title: Partners
sections.content: National Initiative for Human Development (INDH): funding of 100,000 DHS. The 'Irchad' platform: intensive 3-month training. Najm Association: moral and strategic support.
